uk.tlscott.AtmSim

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.tlscott.AtmSim.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class to model a bank card. Simulates deposits and withdrawals from a bank account when ran.
    Author:
    Thomas Scott

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(Account account)
      Creates a new card for account passed.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId()
      Returns the cards ID.
      int localBalance()

      void run()
      Runs 20 transactions on the account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(Account account)
        Creates a new card for account passed.
        Parameters:
        account - to create card for.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs 20 transactions on the account.
        Randomly determines whether to deposit or withdraw. Then takes/adds a random amount.
        On completion prints the card id and the local balance.
        Local balance calculated as : amountWithdrawn - amountDeposited;
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • localBalance

        public int localBalance()
        Returns the local balance of the card.
        Local balance calculated as : amountWithdrawn - amountDeposited;
        Returns:
        int the local balance.

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns the cards ID. Card id is incremented every time a new card is created.
        Returns:
        int the cards id.
